dict.acceptation: 使（人）失望( disappoint的过去式和过去分词)；使破灭，使落空；

sent.orig: We were disappointed, everyone was disappointed, but at this level every team a good team.
sent.trans: 我们很失望，每个人都很沮丧但是这个小组的每支球队都很不错。

sent.orig: Disappointed, and sometimes also a kind of happy, because there will be so disappointed look.
sent.trans: 失望，有时候也是一种幸福，因为有所期待所以才会失望。

sent.orig: Fans were so disappointed when their home team lost the game.
sent.trans: 主队输掉了比赛，令球迷们大失所望。

sent.orig: JERRY: [disappointed] Answering machine. Oh, I hate the idea of somebody out there returning my calls.
sent.trans: 杰瑞：（失望状）答录机，哦，我讨厌有人回复我的电话。
